Publications

  • Noé Lallouet, Tristan Cazenave and Cyrille Enderli. “Pareto‑NRPA: A Novel Monte‑Carlo Search Algorithm for Multi‑Objective Optimization.” ECAI 2025, IOS Press, https://doi.org/10.3233/faia251394.

  • Noé Lallouet, Tristan Cazenave, Cyrille Enderli and Stéphanie Gourdin. “Searching Efficient Deep Architectures for Radar Target Detection Using Monte‑Carlo Tree Search.” 2024 International Radar Conference (RADAR), IEEE, https://doi.org/10.1109/radar58436.2024.10993743.
